articles.author: Elizabeth Cohen, CNN Senior Medical Correspondent
articles.title: Distilleries that made hand sanitizer won't face hefty fine for helping out during pandemic
articles.description: Distilleries that helped out in the beginning of the coronavirus pandemic by making alcohol-based hand sanitizer won't have to pay a hefty fee the government charged them this week by mistake.

articles.author: Devan Cole, CNN
articles.title: Former Pennsylvania Gov. and US Attorney General Dick Thornburgh dead at 88
articles.description: Richard "Dick" Thornburgh, a former Republican governor of Pennsylvania who went on to serve as US attorney general under two presidents, has died at age 88, according to an announcement from the Pennsylvania governor's office.

articles.title: How the effort to vaccine the elderly is going in some states
articles.description: Though some governors have expanded who can receive the vaccine at this time, when exactly those people get a shot depends on supplies and how localities administer them.
articles.content:

articles.title: Ex-GOP senator slams Republicans: May be time for new party
articles.description: Former Republican Senator and Defense Secretary William Cohen criticized members of his own party who are signing on to President Donald Trump's election challenge, comparing them to circus animals under Trump's control.

articles.author: Paul Dwyer, CNN
articles.title: Andy Cohen on ringing in the New Year: 'I'm psyched to hang out with' Anderson Cooper
articles.description: This has been a tumultuous year and Anderson Cooper and Andy Cohen -- like many of us -- are looking forward to saying goodbye and good riddance to 2020.
